languages.text: Любовь их была утонченной и беззаветной, без слов Лорд-капитан и Леди-Навигатор понимали и принимали чувства друг друга. И даже после того, как Кассия взошла на трон Новатора, она отвергала предложения руки и сердца, оставаясь верной первой и единственной любви. С годами мутации изменили тело Леди-Навигатора, Лорд-капитан и Кассия не прекращали поддерживать связь, находя друг в друге отдушину и поддержку.

Their love was delicate and selfless. The Lord Captain and the Lady Navigator wordlessly understood and accepted each other's feelings. Even after Cassia ascended the throne as Novator, she spurned all claims on her hand and heart, remaining loyal to her first and only love. As the years passed, mutations transformed her body, but the bond between the Lord Captain and the Lady Navigator endured and they continued to find solace and consolation in each other.
languages.original_text: Любовь их была утонченной и беззаветной, без слов Лорд-капитан и Леди-Навигатор понимали и принимали чувства друг друга. И даже после того, как Кассия взошла на трон Новатора, она отвергала предложения руки и сердца, оставаясь верной первой и единственной любви. С годами мутации изменили тело Леди-Навигатора, Лорд-капитан и Кассия не прекращали поддерживать связь, находя друг в друге отдушину и поддержку.

traits.locale_text: Their love was delicate and selfless. Lord Captain and Lady Navigator understood and accepted each other's feelings. Even after Cassia ascended to the throne of Novator, she rejected coming marriage proposals, staying loyal to her first and only love. As the years passed, mutations transformed her body, but Lord Captain and Lady Navigator kept in touch, finding solace and consolation in each other.

Even after Cassia ascended the throne as Novator, she spurned all claims on her hand and heart, remaining loyal to her first and only love. As the years passed, mutations transformed her body, but the bond between the Lord Captain and the Lady Navigator endured and they continued to find solace and consolation in each other.

Even after Cassia ascended the throne as Novator, she spurned all claims on her hand and heart, remaining loyal to her first and only love. As the years passed, mutations transformed her body, but the bond between the Lord Captain and the Lady Navigator endured and they continued to find solace and consolation in each other.

languages.text: 他们之间的爱微妙而无私，领主舰长和女导航者无需言语就能理解并接受彼此的感受。当卡西娅登上大族长的宝座后，她拒绝了所有的追求者和他们的甜言蜜语，只忠于她的初恋——也是她唯一的恋人。尽管随着岁月的流逝，她的身体被亚空间的突变扭曲，但她与领主舰长的羁绊依然经久不衰，两人依然在彼此的关系中寻得慰藉。
languages.original_text: Their love was delicate and selfless. The Lord Captain and the Lady Navigator wordlessly understood and accepted each other's feelings. Even after Cassia ascended the throne as Novator, she spurned all claims on her hand and heart, remaining loyal to her first and only love. As the years passed, mutations transformed her body, but the bond between the Lord Captain and the Lady Navigator endured and they continued to find solace and consolation in each other.

traits.locale_text: 他们之间的爱微妙而无私，领主舰长和女导航者无需言语就能理解并接受彼此的感受。当卡西娅登上大族长的宝座后，她拒绝了所有的求婚，只忠于她的初恋——也是她唯一的恋人。尽管随着岁月的流逝，她的身体被亚空间的突变扭曲，但领主舰长依然与她保持着联系，在彼此的关系中寻得慰藉。

languages.text: Ihre Liebe war sanft und selbstlos. Der Lord Captain und die Lady Navigator verstanden einander wortlos und akzeptieren die Gefühle des anderen. Selbst, nachdem Cassia als Novatorin den Thron bestiegen hatte, lehnte sie sämtliche Anträge ab und blieb ihrer ersten und einzigen Liebe treu. Im Lauf der Jahre wurde ihr Körper durch Mutationen verändert, doch das Band zwischen dem Lord Captain und der Lady Navigator überdauerte und sie fanden auch weiterhin Trost ineinander.
languages.original_text: Their love was delicate and selfless. The Lord Captain and the Lady Navigator wordlessly understood and accepted each other's feelings. Even after Cassia ascended the throne as Novator, she spurned all claims on her hand and heart, remaining loyal to her first and only love. As the years passed, mutations transformed her body, but the bond between the Lord Captain and the Lady Navigator endured and they continued to find solace and consolation in each other.

traits.locale_text: Ihre Liebe war delikat und selbstlos. Lord Captain und Lady Navigator verstanden einander wortlos und akzeptieren die Gefühle des anderen. Selbst, nachdem Cassia als Novatorin den Thron erklommen hatte, lehnte sie Heiratsanträge ab und blieb ihrer ersten und einzigen Liebe treu. Im Lauf der Jahre wurde ihr Körper durch Mutationen verändert, doch Lord Captain und Lady Navigator blieben in Kontakt und fanden Trost ineinander.

languages.text: Leur amour était délicat et désintéressé. {mf|Le seigneur-capitaine|La seigneure-capitaine} et la navigatrice se comprenaient et s'acceptaient sans avoir à dire le moindre mot. Même après que Cassia fut montée sur le trône de Novator, elle continua à refuser les demandes en mariage qui lui étaient faites, restant loyale à son seul et unique amour. Au fil des années, diverses mutations transformèrent son corps, mais elles ne purent jamais séparer {mf|le seigneur-capitaine|la seigneure-capitaine} et la navigatrice, qui continuèrent à se réconforter mutuellement.
languages.original_text: Their love was delicate and selfless. The Lord Captain and the Lady Navigator wordlessly understood and accepted each other's feelings. Even after Cassia ascended the throne as Novator, she spurned all claims on her hand and heart, remaining loyal to her first and only love. As the years passed, mutations transformed her body, but the bond between the Lord Captain and the Lady Navigator endured and they continued to find solace and consolation in each other.

traits.locale_text: Leur amour était délicat et désintéressé. {mf|Le seigneur-capitaine|La seigneure-capitaine} et la navigatrice se comprenaient et s'acceptaient sans avoir à dire le moindre mot. Même après que Cassia fut montée sur le trône de Novator, elle continua à refuser les demandes en mariage qui lui étaient faites, restant loyale à son seul et unique amour. Au fil des années, diverses mutations transformèrent son corps, mais elles ne purent jamais séparer {mf|le seigneur-capitaine|la seigneure-capitaine} et la navigatrice, qui continuèrent à se réconforter mutuellement.

languages.text: Su amor era delicado y altruista. {mf|El|La} Lord Capitán y la Lady Navegante entendían y aceptaban los sentimientos del otro sin decir palabra. Incluso después de que Cassia ascendiera a su trono de Novator, rechazó todos los intentos de ganar su mano y su corazón y permaneció leal a su primer y único amor. Con el paso de los años, las mutaciones transformaron su cuerpo, pero el vínculo entre {mf|el|la} Lord Capitán y la Lady Navegante perduró, pues ambos se proporcionaron alivio y consuelo mutuo.
languages.original_text: Their love was delicate and selfless. The Lord Captain and the Lady Navigator wordlessly understood and accepted each other's feelings. Even after Cassia ascended the throne as Novator, she spurned all claims on her hand and heart, remaining loyal to her first and only love. As the years passed, mutations transformed her body, but the bond between the Lord Captain and the Lady Navigator endured and they continued to find solace and consolation in each other.

traits.locale_text: Su amor era delicado y altruista. {mf|El|La} Lord Capitán y la Lady Navegante entendían y aceptaban los sentimientos del otro sin decir palabra. Incluso después de que Cassia ascendiera a su trono de Novator, rechazó todas las propuestas de matrimonio y permaneció leal a su primer y único amor. Con el paso de los años, las mutaciones transformaron su cuerpo, pero {mf|el|la} Lord Capitán y la Lady Navegante permanecieron en contacto y se proporcionaron alivio y consuelo mutuo.

languages.text: 二人の愛は繊細かつ無私のものだった。ロード・キャプテンと女性航宙士は言葉少なに互いの気持ちを理解し合い、受け入れていた。カシアがノベイターとして王座に就いた後も、彼女は結婚の申し出を断り、初めてにして唯一の愛に忠実であり続けた。年月が過ぎ、変異が彼女の体を変化させたもののロード・キャプテンと女性航宙士の絆は揺らぐことはなく、二人は互いの中に慰めと癒しを見出し続けた。
languages.original_text: Their love was delicate and selfless. The Lord Captain and the Lady Navigator wordlessly understood and accepted each other's feelings. Even after Cassia ascended the throne as Novator, she spurned all claims on her hand and heart, remaining loyal to her first and only love. As the years passed, mutations transformed her body, but the bond between the Lord Captain and the Lady Navigator endured and they continued to find solace and consolation in each other.

traits.locale_text: 二人の愛は繊細かつ無私のものだった。ロード・キャプテンと女性航宙士は言葉少なに互いの気持ちを理解し合い、受け入れていた。カシアがノベイターとして王座に就いた後も、彼女は結婚の申し出を断り、初めてにして唯一の愛に忠実であり続けた。年月が過ぎ、変異が彼女の体を変化させたもののロード・キャプテンと女性航宙士の絆は揺らぐことはなく、二人は互いの中に慰めと癒しを見出し続けた。

languages.text: Aşkları narin ve özgeciydi. Lord Kaptan ve Leydi Rotacı, birbirlerinin duygularını kelimelere ihtiyaç duymadan anlıyor ve kabul ediyordu. Cassia; Rota Reisi tahtına geçtikten sonra bile tüm evlilik tekliflerini geri çevirdi, ilk ve tek aşkına sadık kaldı. Yıllar geçtikçe mutasyonlar nedeniyle bedeni değişim geçirmeye başlarken Lord Kaptan ve Leydi Rotacı arasındaki bağ zarar görmedi, birbirlerinde teselli ve avuntu bulmayı sürdürdüler.
languages.original_text: Their love was delicate and selfless. The Lord Captain and the Lady Navigator wordlessly understood and accepted each other's feelings. Even after Cassia ascended the throne as Novator, she spurned all claims on her hand and heart, remaining loyal to her first and only love. As the years passed, mutations transformed her body, but the bond between the Lord Captain and the Lady Navigator endured and they continued to find solace and consolation in each other.

traits.locale_text: Aşkları narin ve özgecildi. Lord Kaptan ve Leydi Rotacı birbirlerinin duygularını kelimelere ihtiyaç duymadan anlıyor ve kabul ediyordu. Cassia, Rota Reisi tahtına geçtikten sonra bile tüm evlilik tekliflerini geri çevirdi ve ilk ve tek aşkına sadık kaldı. Yıllar geçtikçe mutasyonlar nedeniyle bedeni değişim geçirmeye başladı ancak Lord Kaptan ve Leydi Rotacı arasındaki bağ zarar görmedi ve birbirlerinde teselli ve avuntu bulmayı sürdürdüler.
